leaflet.look: A small leaflet with writing on it.
leaflet.read:
"WELCOME TO ZORK!

ZORK is a game of adventure, danger, and low cunning. In it you will explore some of the most amazing territory ever seen by mortals. No computer should be without one!"

mailbox.look: A small mailbox with the flag down.
mailbox.open: Opening the small mailbox reveals a leaflet.

sack.look: An elongated brown sack, smelling of hot peppers.
sack.open: Opening the brown sack reveals a lunch, and a clove of garlic.

lunch.look: A hot pepper sandwich, a ## of water, and a clove of garlic.

garlic.look: A clove of garlic. It has a strong smell.

bottle.look: A clear glass bottle. The glass bottle contains a quantity of water.

sword.look: A gleaming elvish sword of great antiquity. On the blade is an inscription: "Orcrist".

lamp.look: A brass lantern. The lamp is currently off.

rope.look: A length of sturdy rope, approximately 30 feet long.

egg.look: A beautiful jewel-encrusted egg, with a clasp on the side.
egg.open: The egg opens easily, revealing a golden clockwork canary. The canary begins to sing.

canary.look: A beautiful golden clockwork canary, singing a delicate melody.

painting.look: A beautiful painting of a pastoral scene, depicting a family at a continental breakfast.

axe.look: A large and rather worn axe.

torch.look: A large flaming ivory torch, burning brightly.

coffin.look: A solid-gold coffin used for the burial of Ramses II.
coffin.open: The gold coffin opens to reveal a beautiful sceptre within.

sceptre.look: A beautiful sceptre, presumably that of ancient Egypt.

candles.look: A pair of candles burning on the ends of an altar.

book.look: A large black book, open to page 569.
book.read: Each word of the prayer reverberates through the temple: "O ye combatants of evil, bring the darkness to light..."

skull.look: A beautifully carved crystal skull. It appears to be grinning at you rather nastily.

matches.look: A matchbook whose cover says "Visit Beautiful FCD#3". There are a few matches left.

guidebooks.look: Guidebooks entitled "Flood Control Dam #3" published by Frobozz Magic Company.
guidebooks.read: "Flood Control Dam #3 (FCD#3) was constructed in year 783 of the Great Underground Empire to harness the power of the Frigid River..."

tube.look: An object which looks like a tube of toothpaste.
tube.open: The viscous material oozes out and covers everything.

plastic.look: A folded pile of plastic with a small valve attached. It appears to be some kind of boat or raft.

platinumBar.look: A large bar of pure platinum, incredibly heavy.

trunk.look: An old trunk, bulging with assorted jewels.
trunk.open: You open the trunk, revealing a fortune in jewels.

trident.look: Poseidon's own crystal trident, highly ornamented and finely wrought.

jade.look: An exquisite jade figurine of a dragon, about six inches high.

bracelet.look: A sapphire-encrusted bracelet of great value.

shovel.look: A sturdy shovel with a wooden handle.

scarab.look: A beautiful jeweled scarab. It is ornamented with emeralds and sapphires.

coins.look: An old leather bag, bulging with coins.

key.look: A skeleton key, rusty but still functional.

chalice.look: A beautiful silver chalice, intricately engraved.

buoy.look: A red buoy with a dark green label reading "Frobozz Magic Buoy Company".
buoy.open: Opening the buoy reveals a large emerald.
